MasterQuotes.mastertext: You can do hard things! Use the Force!
MasterQuotes.yodatext: Do hard things, you can! The Force you shall use.

MasterQuotes.mastertext: I believe in you, young padawan. Trust in your training.
MasterQuotes.yodatext: Believe in you I do, young padawan. Trust in your training, you must.

MasterQuotes.mastertext: Have patience. When you move too quickly, you miss what's right in front of you.
Breathe in. Breathe out. What do you notice, padawan?
You much unlearn what you have learned. See through Shoshin, or Beginner's Mind
MasterQuotes.yodatext: You must unlearn what you have learned. Use your Shoshin.

MasterQuotes.mastertext: You are a luminous being, capable of anything!
MasterQuotes.yodatext: A luminous being are you. Capable of anything are you

MasterQuotes.mastertext: Growth is growth, no matter how small.
MasterQuotes.yodatext: Growth is grown, how small matters not.

MasterQuotes.mastertext: Empty space is not nothing; it is a powerful something. Learn to see it!
MasterQuotes.yodatext: Nothing empty space is it; A powerful something it is. Learn to see it, you must.

MasterQuotes.mastertext: Your fear must be named before you can banish it.
MasterQuotes.yodatext: Named your fear must be before banish it you can.
